description:
Convert HTML to PDF, Word to PDF, Excel to PDF, PDF to Text, PDF to Image, PDF to HTML, Extract PDF Images, create, edit and save PDF documents in your .NET Core applications using EVO PDF Client for .NET Core. The library is compatible with Azure App Service and with any platform supporting .NET Core and .NET Standard, including Windows, Linux or MacOS.

Before using this client library you have to install the EVO PDF Server in Azure Cloud, in IIS or in a Windows Service as described in product documentation.

The client library for .NET Core is compatible with any platform which supports .NET Standard 2.0 or above, including the platforms listed below:

* .NET Core 7, 6, 5, 3, 2, .NET Standard 2.0 , .NET Framework 4.6.2 (and above)
* Windows, Linux, macOS, Azure including App Service and Functions
* Any type of application including Web, Console and Desktop applications

EVO PDF Client for .NET Core was designed to work under the most restrictive environments like Azure App Service and Functions, Xamarin or Universal Windows Platform (UWP). The regular library for .NET Core can still be used directly in applications on Windows Platform or in web roles and worker roles of Azure Cloud Services.

The HTML to PDF Converter component offers advanced support for CSS3, SVG, Web Fonts and JavaScript, page breaks control with CSS and from API, automatically repeated HTML table header and footer, live URLs and internal links, automatically generated hierarchical bookmarks and table of contents, automatically generated fillable PDF forms and allows you to digitally sign and password protect the generated PDF documents.

You can also convert Word to PDF, Excel to PDF, PDF to Text, PDF to Image, PDF to HTML, Extract PDF Images, create PDF documents with text, graphics, images, headers and footers, security features and digital signatures, interactive forms, internal links, text notes and JavaScript actions, edit, stamp and merge PDF documents.
summary: Convert HTML to PDF in your .NET Core applications for Windows, Linux, MacOS or Azure App Service. This library requires the installation of EVO PDF Server in Azure Cloud, IIS or in a Windows Service.
title: EVO PDF Client for .NET Core
